mapper.select:
select sm.id, sm.menu_code, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_menu_id, sm.seq_number, sm.menu_type as menuTypeEnum, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_url, sm.version_number, sm.enabled, sm.fromSource from sys_menu sm, sys_role_menu srm where srm.menu_id = sm.id and sm.deleted = 0 and sm.enabled = 1 and srm.enabled = 1
and srm.role_id in
#{item}
group by sm.id, sm.menu_code, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_menu_id, sm.seq_number, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_url, sm.version_number, sm.enabled, sm.fromSource, sm.last_updated_date order by sm.seq_number asc, sm.last_updated_date desc

select sm.id, sm.menu_code, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_menu_id, sm.seq_number, sm.menu_type as menuTypeEnum, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_url, sm.fromSource from sys_menu sm, sys_role_menu srm, sys_user_role sur where srm.menu_id = sm.id and sm.menu_type = 1001 and sm.deleted = 0 and sm.enabled = 1 and srm.enabled = 1 and sur.role_id = srm.role_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} group by sm.id, sm.menu_code, sm.menu_name, sm.parent_menu_id, sm.seq_number, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_url, sm.fromSource, sm.last_updated_date order by sm.seq_number asc, sm.last_updated_date desc

select sm.id from sys_role_menu srm, sys_menu sm where srm.menu_id = sm.id and sm.enabled = 1 and srm.role_id = #{roleId} and not exists ( select 1 from sys_role_menu_button srb, sys_menu_button smb where srb.button_id = smb.id and smb.enabled = 1 and smb.deleted = 0 and smb.menu_id = sm.id and srb.role_id = #{roleId} ) union all select smb.id from sys_role_menu_button srb, sys_menu_button smb where srb.button_id = smb.id and smb.enabled = 1 and smb.deleted = 0 and srb.role_id = #{roleId}

select id, code, name, type, parentId from (select sm.id, sm.menu_code code, sm.menu_name name, 'DIRECTORY' type, sm.parent_menu_id parentId from sys_menu sm where sm.enabled = 1 and sm.deleted = 0 union all select smb.id, smb.button_code code, smb.button_name name, 'BUTTON' type, smb.menu_id parentId from sys_menu_button smb where smb.enabled = 1 and smb.deleted = 0) t order by t.type, parentId, code
select count(*) from sys_role_menu smr where smr.role_id = ${roleId} and exists (select 1 from sys_menu sm where sm.parent_menu_id = ${menuId} and sm.id = smr.menu_id)
